page.title: 16GAMES
page.content:
{Gregory Rose age 9 }
My favourite{indoor game}is{tennis. {Tennis}has a racket.A racket is a piece of wood with nylon in it.There are two people.You have to bat the ball over a net and other person bats it back. An{outdoor game}I like is{Ghostbusters It is a game with four people on each side.There are four ghosts and four ghostbusters.The ghostbusters chase the ghosts.When the ghosts get caught other ghosts can tig them out of the ghostbusters den.It is a very good game.In{Off Ground Tig}one person is on.When you jump on a bin or something it's a den. In{Hide and Seek}someone goes and hides and someone else goes and tries to find them.The first person to get caught is on.
